heading: Today
text: Morning snow showers in the northeast, with mostly sunny skies. More sunshine developing through the afternoon as showers diminish. Highs in the 20s to near 30 north, low to mid 30s south. West to northwest wind 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 20 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Clear skies early, then increasing clouds. Chance of scattered snow showers west of the Greens after midnight. Lows in the low to mid 20s south and in the Champlain Valley, teens to near 20 north. Wind becoming light and variable.

heading: Sunday
text: Widespread snow showers, mixing with rain in the valleys in the afternoon. Highs from the mid 30s to low 40s, a few spots staying near freezing in the northeast. Wind becoming south to southeast 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 30 mph.
